subject: Drugs (Pharmaceuticals)
Horses
Polo
organizations: United States Food and Drug Administration
lead_paragraph: The United States Food and Drug Administration wants a Florida pharmacy to stop making animal drugs after it mixed a brew of supplements that killed 21 elite polo horses as they prepared for a championship match last year
snippet: The United States Food and Drug Administration wants a Florida pharmacy to stop making animal drugs after it mixed a brew of supplements that killed 21 elite polo horses as they prepared for a championship match last year
